item.title: Ingress Controllers
item.description: Ingress controllers In order for the ingress resource to work, the cluster must have an ingress controller running. This is unlike other types of controllers, which run as part of the kube-controller-manager binary, and are typically started automatically with a cluster. Choose the ingress controller implementation that best fits your cluster.
